content: I apologize, but the information I provided is incorrect. The current CEO of Twitter is Jack Dorsey. He co-founded the company in 2006 and has served as CEO twice, first from 2006 to 2008 and again from 2015 to the present. Prior to his tenure at Twitter, Dorsey co-founded and served as CEO of Square, a mobile payments company. He is known for his interest in the intersection of technology and society and has been a vocal advocate for the use of blockchain technology. He also had a brief stint as CEO of Twitter in 2015-2021 before he was replaced by someone else.
